meanings.definition: Make a low, continuous, regular sound.
meanings.sent1: The fan was whirring softly in the background.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the machine whirring as it worked.
meanings.sent3: The whirring of the blender made me crave a smoothie.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was whirring with ideas for the project.
meanings.sent5: The whirring of the wind turbines filled the air with energy.

meanings.sent1: The constant whirring of the engine was soothing.
meanings.sent2: I could fall asleep to the gentle whirring of the fan.
meanings.sent3: The whirring of the old computer sounded like a lullaby.
meanings.sent4: Amidst the city noise, the whirring of the clock was comforting.
meanings.sent5: The whirring of the helicopter overhead drowned out all other sounds.
